hiveArticle.title: Edit Button Just Spins and Does Not Load Edit Page in Utopian.io
hiveArticle.body:
When you go to your profile and click Edit Button just below the Contribution. ![image.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1511875179/vzqhaqjizf6ynkvlf9zz.png) It just spins and does not do anything as shown below. It did not gave any Console Error also, might be it did not get the timely response from the Server. ![ezgif.com-video-to-gif.gif](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1511875106/i2tnc9xqddp7jpmj8ry4.gif) ### Expected Behaviour It should open up the Edit page for that particular Contribution. ##### Browser : Chrome
Posted on Utopian.io - Rewarding Open Source Contributors
